{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = SpectralLightningDeath2 | class = SpectralLightningDeath2 | game = Strife }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]]→SpectralLightningDeath2
 →[[Classes:SpectralLightningBigBall1|SpectralLightningBigBall1]]
  →[[Classes:SpectralLightningBigBall2|SpectralLightningBigBall2]]
A variant of [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]] that skips the first two frames of it's death animation. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SpectralLightningDeath2 : [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]] { States { Death: Goto Super::Death+2 } }
